name: Algua cow
description:
Did you know that cows release 30 to 50 gallons of methane a day through their farts and belches?

But did you also know that by adding a small amount of seaweed to the cwos’ feed, researchers found, they could cut the cows’ methane production by nearly 60%?

In this game, you will play as a hungry cow who needs to eat to survive as long as possible. But be careful about what you eat! The world depends on it.
